name: Morpheus' (Unpaid) Intern
description:
NOTES:

  • Please maximize the viewport before playing! (click the blue box with the two arrows).
  • The Exit buttons in game do not work in the WebGL build.

Description:

Play as an unpaid intern of the god of dreams, running around with your trusty dreamcatcher. Your goal is to protect a child from nightmares while also letting good dreams through. Be careful-- if the child has too many bad dreams, you might lose your position!

Feedback Form: https://forms.gle/UFd2bNCmfNNTWVHw9

Controls:

WASD to move J to catch dreams

Credits:

Programming by Hailey Tran, Sara Viray, and Sharon Zhong
Art by Cynthia Xiong
Mentoring by Jeremy Ernst
